name: Flame Arrow
description: You turn ammunition (such as arrows, bolts, shuriken, and stones) into fiery projectiles. Each piece of ammunition deals an extra 1d6 points of fire damage to any target it hits. A flaming projectile can easily ignite a flammable object or structure, but it won't ignite a creature it strikes. Material Component: A drop of oil and a small piece of flint.
target: Fifty projectiles, all of which must be in contact with each other at the time of casting
